title: Trying to reconnect while in champ select
body:
I got a "Trying to reconnect to League Client" message while in ranked champ select on the beta client and it booted me from the champ select. My internet is fine, no ping spikes at all (ran connection tests to make sure my ping is stable). It gave me a 5 minute dodge timer.

Is this an issue with the client itself or is it just that I was unlucky?

replies.body: Even though your internet is fine and has solid ping, it seems like your network is unstable and getting you cut off during champion select.  You should run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your network and keep you from getting left behind.  Let me know if you have any questions on this.
